search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Emma (emma.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Who is eligible for these plans?

These plans are available to all new Emma customers who purchase a plan from July 21 2022.

--------------------------------

From Custom Design to Success Management and more, our [Professional Services](https://myemma.com/email-marketing-services/) are like an extension of your marketing team, ready to help you create an email program that builds long-term brand loyalty, maximizes the success of your marketing, and drives the best possible results for your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing varies based on the number of contacts and additional features. SMS is available as an add-on.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Marketers who need to nail the basics.
Growing brands who need more customization and automation.
Teams with multiple departments or locations who need to manage marketing activity from one central account.
Larger organizations who need to scale and control their marketing efficiently and seamlessly.

additional_fees.fee_description: Additional charges apply for removing Emma branding from emails.
